name: Bumper Pong - Hardest Bounce Game Ever!
name_original: Bumper Pong - Hardest Bounce Game Ever!
description:
Bumper Pong is an endless water pong game with hungry sharks! How many coins can you collect?

Prepare for a near impossible, hardest and most difficult challenge in the world of Bumper Pong. Push your skills to the limit as you pong your characters through shark infested waters.

One touch game play with endless boundaries that will keep you entertained for hours! Bumper Pong is one of the 'Hardest Games Ever' created. Do you accept the challenge?

Game Features:
• Endless bumper pong game;
• Three games modes (normal, hard and impossible), to test your wit and concentration;
• Unlock all 15 characters as you collect more coins:
• Simple yet stunning graphics and game play;
• No one game is the same; and
• Game Center integration (with leaderboards and achievements) so you can play with your friends!

Challenge yourself with this seamlessly impossible pong-tastic, bumper pong style game..
